Justin Holiday was dialed in with Justin Holiday shot , going 6 - for - 8 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while adding seven rebounds as well . Zach LaVine led all scorers , going 12 - for - 21 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 33 points in 37 minutes . Cameron Payne chipped in 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG ) and two assists , in 27 minutes off its bench . Detroit was led by a fantastic performance from Blake Griffin , who scored a season - high 33 points to go along with eight rebounds and eight assists . Reggie Bullock also had a solid contribution off the bench , scoring 16 points ( 1 - 13 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and pulling down five rebounds . Reggie Jackson amassed 18 points , three rebounds and five assists , but missed a game - tying three at the buzzer . The Bulls now head to Dallas for a Monday night showdown versus the Mavericks  while the Detroit Pistons will return home to face the 76ers on Tuesday .

Oklahoma_City got an impressive 23 points from Paul George ( 6 - 17 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , who also put up six rebounds , five assists and four steals . Steven Adams rounded out the starting five 's productive afternoon with 18 points , five rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Russell Westbrook added 17 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) , five rebounds and nine assists off the bench as well . Jrue Holiday was also big , totaling 22 points , seven rebounds and 13 assists in the victory . Davis followed with 20 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal . Nikola Mirotic was the other high scorer , finishing with 16 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , 16 rebounds and two steals in 32 minutes . The Thunder now head to Cleveland for a Wednesday night showdown versus the Cavaliers  while the Pelicans will look to bounce back when they take on Chicago Bulls on Wednesday .

Alex Abrines came off the bench to collect 21 points , two rebounds and three assists , while going 7 - of - 11 from three - point range . Taurean Waller-Prince was The Hawks player to score in double figures , scoring 15 points ( 3 - 2 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , grabbing five rebounds and recording three steals in 34 minutes off the bench . John Collins was unstoppable Friday , going 9 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the free throw line to finish with a game - high of 19 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot . Alex Len was a big factor as well , going 7 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while adding eight rebounds in 23 minutes . The Thunder now head to Detroit for a Monday night showdown versus the Pistons  while the Hawks will look to bounce back when they take on Golden_State Warriors on Monday .

Led by Marc Gasol 's 27 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting , the Grizzlies posted a 55 percent success rate from the floor and 45 percent mark from three - point range . Mike Conley fell just shy of a triple - double , accumulating 20 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . Kyle Lowry shot 8 - for - 14 from the field and 6 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 24 points in 37 minutes . Kawhi Leonard chipped in with 17 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 9 3Pt , 2 - 9 FT ) , nine rebounds and five assists over 37 minutes as well . The only other player to score in double digits for the T-Wolves was Serge Ibaka , who chipped in 16 on 7 - of - 11 shooting , in 35 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies now head to Brooklyn for a Friday night showdown versus the Nets  while the Raptors will look to continue their winning streak when they host Warriors on Thursday .

Kuzma went 6 - for - 16 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to finish with 20 points , while also adding eight rebounds and four assists . LeBron James did a little bit of everything for Los_Angeles , with 20 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) , eight assists , six rebounds , and two steals , but it was n't enough . The Grizzlies now head to Denver for a Monday night showdown versus the Nuggets  while the Lakers will look to continue their winning streak when they host Heat on Monday .

Russell Westbrook had a triple - double with 15 points ( 12 - 16 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt ) , 13 rebounds , 15 assists , three steals and one block in 33 minutes . Paul George provided 46 points , 17 of which came in the 2 half , to go along with five rebounds , four assists and four steals on 7 - of - 16 shooting . Jerami Grant on the other hand had an outstanding shooting display , as Jerami Grant finished 8 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 20 points . Jaren Jackson led the Grizzlies in scoring with 27 points ( 12 - 18 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) , to go with seven rebounds , one assist and one steal . Ivan Rabb fell one rebound shy of a double - double , accruing 15 points , nine rebounds , four assists and three blocks in the win . Mike Conley struggled shooting ( 5 - 15 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt ) but still finished with 15 points , eight assists , two rebounds and two steals . The Thunder now head to Houston for a Saturday night showdown versus the Rockets  while the Grizzlies will look to bounce back when they take on New_Orleans Pelicans on Saturday .

Rudy Gay was the only bench player with more than seven points , as Rudy Gay dropped 18 points and nine rebounds in 27 minutes . Next , the Spurs will head to Cleveland to face Cavaliers on Sunday . The Wizards now head to New_York for a Sunday night showdown versus the Knicks .
